name: HPPrinter
0:
”Alexa, ask My Printer to print my shopping list.”
”Alexa, ask My Printer to print a checklist.”
”Alexa, ask My Printer to print a coloring page.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my printer
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get voice-activated printing that saves you time and delivers a hands-free experience for how, when, and where you want to get work done.

Increase productivity by printing your Alexa lists and forms all with a simple voice command. Have fun printing coloring pages and games. Print directly from other Alexa skills in one seamless experience—including recipes and more. 

Link your HP web-connected printer [1], then you can just say:

Alexa, ask my Printer to…

Alexa Lists:
- print my shopping list
- print my to-do list
- print my travel* list

Forms:
- print a checklist
- print lined paper
- print metric graph paper
- print a calendar for next month

Coloring pages from Crayola:
- print a Crayola coloring page
- print a coloring page for kids

Games:
- print a number puzzle game
- get a word search game
- print bingo cards

Help and Support:
- check if my printer is online
- how to delete the print queue


If you have comments or suggestions, reach out to us at voice.print@hp.com. Find help at www.hp.com/go/HPAlexaPrint or contact HP support on Facebook Messenger at http://hp.care/alexa

[1] Requires HP account and HP web-connected printer registered on HP Connected. For details see: www.hp.com/go/HPAlexaPrint.

* Ask to print any of your custom lists by saying its name

1. Requires the HP Smart app download. For details on local printing requirements see hp.com/go/mobileprinting. Certain features/software are available in English language only.
